articles.author: Isabel Mcmillan
articles.title: Urgent warning issued to Android mobile phone users over new virus threat - Daily Mail
articles.description: Three viruses are in circulation - related to 19 apps on android devices - designed to steal private information and sign users up to premium services, Australians have been warned.
articles.content:
Phone users all over Australia are being warned over a string of app hijackings spreading malicious viruses.
